TEXT.TITLE: CENTRAL BANCORP INC <CBAN> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 1.02 dlrs vs 78 cts Net 14.4 mln vs 11.0 mln NOTE: 1987 net includes gain 2,222,000 dlrs from termination of pension plan. Results restated for pooled acquisitions and share adjusted for stock dividends. Reuter
